name: market for chimney | chimney | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5968/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'chimney', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;Thisis an immobile infrastructure, representing the product of a chimney that is used to release smoke and combustion gases up from a fire or furnace. It has a lifetime of 80 years. Its production represents all the building  materials for a chimney and decommission, but it excludes energy use for construction.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the supply of  chimney', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/43:Specialized construction activities/439:Other specialized construction activities/4390:Other specialized construction activities
